Requirement Name: Customer Service Place Order Queue Configuration

Comments: I think this is accurate, but if someone is calling the finance number, they're going to finance. If they call the customer service number and press 1, that call should just flow over to the finance queue. There would be no need to label the call, or for the agent to say a special greeting.
